dict.string: Generate a google hangout link via Safari or Google Chrome and place the hangout URL in your clipboard

delay 1.5 tell application "System Events" set browser_apps to the name of every process whose visible is true
if "Safari" is in browser_apps then tell application "Safari" set hangout to URL of current tab of front window end tell else if "Google Chrome" is in browser_apps then tell application "Google Chrome" set hangout to URL of active tab of front window end tell end if end tell
set the clipboard to hangout

https://github.com/wallace/google_hangout_workflow
This script will post a link into Safari or Google Chrome that will generate a hangout link if you're already authenticated via your google account. The generated hangout link will then be copied into your clipboard for easy sharing.
